duties_responsibilities.duty: Provide technical assistance to computer system users, including desktop/server software/hardware set-up and troubleshooting.
End-user support for proprietary tools and Microsoft Office Products.
Configure AAD (Azure Active Directory), ADO (Azure DevOps) project management, and access control management.
Create and maintain documentation for IT surface area and access control for project teams.
Collaborate with project leaders to create processes, documentation, and self-serve solutions library.
Support the Company’s games publishing team and be vital in their ability to publish new games.
Build and promote an inclusive environment where people’s lived experiences are embraced and valued.
Work with XBOX publishing and XGSIT teams to support emergent tasks and be a strong partner.
Attend team meetings, planning meetings, stand-ups, and regular face-to-face meetings with the sponsor.
